definition: to repeat a lesson/to learn by heart/to endorse a check
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The third part explores the legal system of indorsement forgery.
sentences.chinese: 本文第三部分探討了背書僞造法律制度。

sentences.english: The Red Seal endorsement allows for interprovincial mobility.
sentences.chinese: 紅印章背書允許跨省流動的。

sentences.english: Endoresment after date has been a difficult point in note theory.
sentences.chinese: 期後背書是票據法中的一個理論難點。

sentences.english: The boy made many blunders as he stumbled through his recitation.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩在訥訥的背書中出了很多差錯。

sentences.english: We have the support of the Mayor of Fremantle and the Mayor of Wellington.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有弗里曼特爾市長和威靈頓市長的背書。

sentences.english: NO05,6. Please endorse the back of this check before you deposit it.
sentences.chinese: 存入這張支票前，請在後面背書。

sentences.english: On the Succession of Indorsement of Bill;
sentences.chinese: 目前針對票據背書的研究逐漸增多。

sentences.english: The form of the indorsement James uses will also affect future attempts to negotiate the instrument.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯的背書形式也會影響今後使該票據流通的努力。

sentences.english: It must be an indorsement of the entire bill.
sentences.chinese: 它須爲匯票全額之背書。

sentences.english: It was not until the next day, however, that Ma endorsed Wu Poh-hsiung's continuing as KMT chairman.
sentences.chinese: 直到第二天，馬才背書吳伯雄繼續擔任黨主席。

sentences.english: That kind of negative endorsement, it’s the opposite of an advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的負面的背書，會起到相反的廣告作用。

sentences.english: We have sent the above original B/L to our consignee because of our misplay.
sentences.chinese: 我們在此提交全套的正本提單和銀行背書註明貨物。

sentences.english: He sent me standing in the courtyard, endorsement, I loudly from a to Z by.
sentences.chinese: 他罰我立在院當中背書，我大聲地從頭到尾地背書。

sentences.english: He sent me standing in the courtyard, endorsement, I loudly from a to Z by.
sentences.chinese: 他罰我立在院當中背書，我大聲地從頭到尾地背書。

definition: variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
roll call/to mention sb by name/(to call or praise or criticize sb) by name
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
